text: Based anɨb okok, nɨmam Josep nop nɨgel yɨlɨk gek, nop dɨl bɨ ogɨnap kɨlop ñelak, tawɨl dad man Yijip amnɨlak agak. Amel, bɨ yokɨp wog gɨñeb ak yolɨgup agak. Anɨgɨl mɨdɨl, Josep mɨdtep ma gak ak pen, God ne Josep nop sawl ma gak agak. Ne ayɨp mɨdɨl, mɨŋel ne okok mɨdupsek gɨjuwɨl, Yijip bɨnonɨm nop gos ñak agak. Ñek bɨnonɨm agak, Bɨ Josep anɨb ak, ne nɨgtep yɨbɨl gup agak. Anɨb agɨl, nop agek, kal tap nop okok sek, man Yijip sek kod yolɨgup agak.
